title: How's life going for 12th standard students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Disastrous Miserable Students don't have classes no school , no tution , no coaching How they are supposed to study We just have 5 months now and still the preparation has not yet completed even 50% We want the government to please postpone the session Final exams of 12th and 10th should be held in June or July so atleast the students can get some time to study GUYS PLEASE DO UPVOTE SO THAT OUR VOICE REACH THE PARLIAMENT AND GOVT COULD HEED OUR DEMAND
